message.body: Hey. I didn't know you texted me or else I would've answered. Michael asked me about it. Haha. But I'm sorry I couldn't go out today. I can tomorrow, but Michael said you were working.

Yea he told me, apparently you and Sam didn't get my message. Darn phone! It's okay. Yea, I'm working tomorrow :( but actually, I'm not working next Saturday and I'm planning to go out to a bar. I'm thinking Lucy's or some place with alcohol and loud music hahah. You in?
Hehe putting the word out there ahead of time. Hopefully I won't be snowing or this cold next weekend. Well, hope it's 70 degrees if I'm really hoping!
Haha. And now it's snowing! Yay! You must be so thrilled!
Ehh, just sucks I have to head out in this. It looks pretty, but it's cold!!!
